fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Environment, Regional Policy, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Any dossier related to the Common Agricultural Policy as well as Animal Health, the Environment and related policy areas.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: European Forum for Nature Conservation and Pastoralism (EFNCP)
goals__remit: The German Professional Shepherds Organization represents the interests of professional sheep farmers from Germany on the National and European level. The majority of our members are engaged in extensive, high-nature value livestock systems. We are aiming to secure the future of pastoral farming but also to preserve our nature.
